body:
Comment 5: 
This is not an issue with Go.  It's an issue with the version of gold packaged for
Ubuntu.  Basically everything linked with gold fails because of STT_IFUNC symbols in
libc.  The Ubuntu bug report suggests that the current Ubuntu gold package fixes the
problem.

In any case there is no change to Go that will avoid this problem, so I'm closing this
as WontFix.
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
